short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plan your day, stay focused, make meaningful progress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your tasks and schedules in one place!

Use Today to:
✅ Capture tasks
✅ Time block (sync with Google Calendar)
✅ Stay focused

All data is stored locally on your browser. We don't have access to them. We're still in beta and under development. Expect some bugs.
